summary: An end‑to‑end pipeline that takes an input image and a natural‑language instruction, encodes the image into latent space, processes the instruction with dual CLIP text encoders, runs a conditional diffusion denoising step using a UNet and scheduler, and decodes the result back to a pixel‑level edited image. It supports optional aesthetic conditioning, zero‑negative prompts, invisible watermarking, and loading of LoRA or textual‑inversion weights.
business_intent: Provide developers and creative professionals with a programmable tool for high‑quality, text‑driven image manipulation, enabling automated retouching, content generation, and visual effects workflows.
